project.title: Cg Texture Shaders
project.subtitle: Written in Cg with ShaderLab, for the Built-in RP in Unity
implementationDetails: Using the 2D Property type in ShaderLab and the sampler2D data type in Cg.
Mapping the uv coordinates to a texel using the tex2D function.
Ripple effect calculated using a radial vector to the center of the quad.
Transition and blending between textures using smoothstep.
